description:
Vampire : Hidden Object Adventure Game Free

Secret of the Vampire Hidden Object Game 300 Levels is a mind-teasing and
Soul-stirring game for the best players of hidden object games.
All the secrets are revealed.And so much more are waiting for you to find out at Secret of the Vampire!

Find hidden clues and solve exciting puzzles across 300 places that draw you right into the heart of the mystery!
Are you ready forhidden object games for free? Continue the hidden object adventure NOW! Find out all hidden object adventure journey is a must-have for all the Hidden Object game lovers!

Features:you will get in Secret of the Vampire: Hidden Object Game 300 Levels: -

-- Beautifully hand crafted levels and puzzles.
-- Multiple ways to play, search and find the hidden objects.
--By using the ‘Zoom in’ feature, find ‘the hard to find’ hidden objects.
-- More than 3000 Hidden Objects to Find!
-- Use HINTS to help yourself for searching the hidden objects.
-- Different Hidden Object scenes in 300 Levels.
-- Download Hidden Objects game for free.

Agent James is ready to start the expedition to solve the exhilarating mystery of the Haunted Island. Find the hidden gems and jewels by getting paired with our gorgeous secret agent James. Help her in tracking the map and finding hidden objects in every magnificent scene. Take your magnifying glasses out, and find out every single hidden object on the island. Play Secret of the Vampire: Hidden Object Game 300 Levels anywhere anytime without the need of internet connection. Download this adventure game now, and start your horror jurney !!
